song.title: Crown Him With Many Crowns
song.author: Godfrey Thring and Matthew Bridges
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .F#m D A/C# Esus E
[1] .F#m D2 Crown Him with many crowns . A/C# Esus The Lamb upon His throne . F#m E B/D# E Hark! How the heavenly anthem drowns . E B Esus All music but its own || . A/C# D2 Awake, my soul and sing . B Esus - E Of Him who died for me . F#m E D2 A/C# And hail Him as thy matchless King . Bm7 Esus A Through all eternity
[C] .D2 A/C# Majesty, Lord of all . D2 F#m Esus Let every throne, before Him fall || . D2 The King of Kings . A/C# O come adore . Bm7 A/C# Esus A Our God who reigns forevermore ---
[2] Crown Him the Lord of life Who triumphed o'er the grave And rose victorious in the strife For those He came to save || His glories now we sing Who died and rose on high Who died eternal life to bring And lives that death may die
[B] . D2 A/C# Esus All hail, Redeemer, hail . A A/C# D2 For He has died for me || . D2 A F#m Esus His praise and glory shall not fail . D2 Esus A (F#m) Throughout eternity
[Outro] .E2 B/D# Majesty! Lord of all . E2 G#m F#sus Let every throne, before Him fall || . E2 The King of Kings . B/D# O come adore . C#m7 B/D# F#sus B Our God who reigns forevermore || . C#m7 B/D# F#sus B Praise God who reigns forevermore . C#m7 B/D# F#sus B Youâ€™re the God who reigns forevermore
